cards.html:
Nintendo Labo has been shown off in many ways, recently being on Jimmy Fallon with Ariana Grande. But now, a video has dropped of the composer of Game of Thrones composer playing the theme song of the show on a Labo Piano! Check it out…

So awesome! Hopefully we’ll see more crazy Nintendo Labo videos as the cardboard based game continues to grow in popularity.

 

What do you think? Is this the crazy crossover that you never knew you wanted until now? Let us know in the comments below.
